page.title: 06St Peters Church Chailey
page.content: St Peters Church is very old, it has chancel which was built around 1250 and the tower was built in 1280. During the nineteenth century there was a north aisle added and alter, in the same century another was built The ancient parts of the building are constructed of sandstone.There are six bells, five of them date from 1737 and the sixth was added in 1810. The Rector is the Rev Eddie Mathias and he has been Rector for 20 years. He visits the school every weekend presents the team points cup. He looks after the vilalge minibus and s the Chairman of the School Governors. Every year in June a special service is held and many children attend. Rev Mathias never stands in the pulpit because he likes to talk to the congregation in a natural and easy manner.
